name: Earth Defenders
description:
During the game, you play the role of one of the army commanders who faces alien invaders.
You will be accompanied by other generals during the campaign.

There are 2 breeds to choose from
+ Earth Defenders
+ Invaders

The game offers:
+ a vehicle builder with a selection of weapons and shields
+ different types of weapons
+ different types of vehicles
+ different types of shields
+ possibility of building a base
+ ability to upgrade buildings and units
+ management of units and buildings
+ electricity management system
+ campaigns
+ various maps
+ extraction and trade of raw materials
+ and a lot more
